title: Strengthening Web Development Practical Skills: Cultural-Based Indigenous Numeracy System Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic grasp of mathematical concepts and foundational awareness of one’s native language
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can accurately represent numbers up to 100 by utilizing the base-20 structure of indigenous numeral systems.
Learners can complete a project explaining the historical background and cultural significance of their own cultural numeral systems.
Learners can write an analytical report comparing the differences between indigenous and Western numeral systems.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
